nodes.text: Meggal was a captain in service to the Galactic Republic during the High Republic Era. The captain commanded a Longbeam during efforts to rescue victims of the Great Hyperspace Disaster and subsequent Emergences, working in a team which also included Joss and Pikka Adren in the Aurora III and the Jedi Te'Ami and Mikkel Sutmani. During the fortieth Emergence, when the team was attacked by the Nihil cruiser Lourna Dee while attempting to retrieve the flight recorder of the destroyed freighter Legacy Run, Te'Ami's Jedi Vector and a Longbeam flown by Marcus Augur and Beth Petters were destroyed. Meggal went after the flight recorder, successfully retrieving it while the Adrens and Sutmani attacked the Lourna Dee, forcing its commander to retreat.
